subject: Baseball
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: The cheers in the new stadium were definitely not of the Bronx variety as Muhammad Ali made a pregame appearance and the embattled slugger David Ortiz posed with young fans.
snippet: The cheers in the new stadium were definitely not of the Bronx variety as Muhammad Ali made a pregame appearance and the embattled slugger David Ortiz posed with young fans.
